dmca.title: DMCA Copyright Infringement SECOND NOTICE, 08-18-2004
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Sean Rabbitt [mailto:cadel@rabbitvalley.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, August 18, 2004 6:57 AM
To: gpoletes@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: DMCA Copyright Infringement SECOND NOTICE, 08-18-2004

 



Begin forwarded message:

From: Sean Rabbitt <cadel@rabbitvalley.com>
Date: August 18, 2004 7:56:06 AM EDT
To: <copyright@theplanet.com> <copyright@theplanet.com>
<copyright@theplanet.com>
Cc: <abuse@theplanet.com> <abuse@theplanet.com>, Nexxus
<Webmaster@FurNation.com>, Matt High <mhigh@coldcut.com>, SexyFur.com
Administrator <admin@SexyFur.com>
Subject: DMCA Copyright Infringement SECOND NOTICE, 08-18-2004

This notice is being sent to copyright@theplanet.com, abuse@theplanet.com,
and a copy is being sent to SexyFur.com at admin@sexyfur.com and Furnation
Multimedia at webmaster@furnation.com.

This is the SECOND NOTICE of a formal notification that your service is
being used to violate copyright law under the DMCA provision Section 202.
Please see the attached, signed statement with the PDF documenting our first
contact with you on AUGUST 10, 2004.

The following information should help you to identify/remove or
terminate

the service of the individual(s) violating copyright of our protected
work.

We request that the individual's website be terminated and the
individual(s)

banned from your service.


I am writing this letter to you in regards to the following website
address:


http://www.f-x-c.net


This website is located at the following IP address, which is hosted
within

your system at The Planet:


67.18.219.130


OrgName:     ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.

OrgID:          TPCM

Address:       1333 North Stemmons Freeway

Address:       Suite 110

City:             Dallas

StateProv:    TX

PostalCode:  75207

Country:       US


This website is designed to be a paid-subscription service using the
Bit

Torrent system to distribute copyrighted and stolen content.  The
website I produce is being distributed with this system (a list of the
actual files will be displayed below).  Content from other companies

and producers of copyrighted works are also being distributed using
this

system, one of which is Radio Comix (we do not represent this

company, but we have notified them of this infringement).


We request that you disable this website.  Also, we ask that you
retain any

information related to the owner/operator of this website pending
possible

litigation we are seeking at this time.


Information regarding the DMCA violations and Formal Notification
letter

follow.


DMCA TITLE II-ONLINE COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT, SEC. 202 ELEMENTS OF

NOTIFICATION


----------


>>> (I) A physical or electronic signature of a person authorized to
act on

behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.


The electronic signature provided with this email constitutes legal

electronic signing of a digital document.


----------


>>> (II) Identification of the copyrighted work claimed to have been

infringed, or, if multiple copyrighted works at a single online site
are

covered by a single notification, a representative list of such works
at

that site.


Fel's Demon Hunter Portfolio

Circles 5

Associated Student Bodies 1-8

Circles 1=>4


All the infringed works have been scanned or

ripped into their present digital formats for transmission without our

consent.


----------


>>> (III) Identification of the material that is claimed to be
infringing or

to be the subject of infringing activity and that is to be removed or
access

to which is to be disabled, and information reasonably sufficient to
permit

the service provider to locate the material.


To get direct access to these files you will need to log into the
system.  I

am providing you our own access Username and Password, which we would

appreciate that you keep confidential as we use this access point to
verify

what files are being distributed:


Username:  Gideon

Password:  Gideon123


FORUM SUB-MENU:  Forums > Furry Bittorrents > Video > SexyFur 7-1-04
Site rip



----------


>>> (IV) Information reasonably sufficient to permit the service
provider to

contact the complaining party, such as an address, telephone number,
and, if

available, an electronic mail address at which the complaining party
may be

contacted.


Rabco Publishing Inc

PO Box 540568

Waltham, MA  02454-0568


Phone: (781) 373-1950

Email: cadel@rabbitvalley.com


----------


>>> (V) A statement that the complaining party has a good faith belief
that

use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by
the

copyright owner, its agent, or the law.


I, president of RABCO Publishing Inc, a Massachusetts corporation, did
not give nor have I ever

given permission for these works to be supplied for distribution on the

Internet.  These files have been converted from their original format,
and

have been altered for distribution, which is against our wishes.


----------


>>> (VI) A statement that the information in the notification is
accurate,

and under penalty of perjury, that the complaining party is authorized
to

act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly

in-fringed.


I, Sean Rabbitt, certify that the information I have given is accurate

as I can retrieve with the information and technical ability we have

available.


I do not represent Monitor Studios, Radio Comix, or Furnation
Multimedia, but I am giving notice of

copyright infringement of their copyright work also in this statement.



Sincerely,


Sean Rabbitt


--

Rabbit Valley - RABCO Publishing Inc. - Customer Service Dept.

Call 1-781-373-1950 or E-Mail customerservice@rabbitvalley.com


Please include this ENTIRE message when replying.  We get several
dozen mails per day, and we can't remember all of them.  Thanks!


"They that can give up essential liberty to obtain a little temporary
safety deserve neither liberty nor safety."

    Benjamin Franklin, Historical Review of Pennsylvania, 1759


</excerpt>--
